casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Stephen C. McCullough (10043)

Dupont, C. J., Landau and Heiman, Js.

Argued December 13, 1991 decision released January 7, 1992 *932Stephen C. McCullough, pro se, the appellant (defendant). Paul J. Ferencek, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were JohnM. Bailey, state’s attorney, and Antonia Carabillo, deputy assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
